name: Beetle
overview: The aim of Beetle is to reach the top of the garden wall before the green beetle. The wall consists of a hundred levels, each full of baddies that will glady eat you, and baby grubs that have to be collected. Once all the grubs are safe, the teleporter will be activated and you can proceed onto the next level. You have to beat the game within 40 minutes. Apart from the platforming, there are bonus levels with different gameplay taken from popular titles like Pang and Obscure Blitz.
